post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
We have 1 opening at the moment and it could be Senior or Intermediate position.

If you are a good fit and interested in this position, please forward your resume to me.
I will arrange an interview.

fkwon@bitfone.com
www.bitfone.com

=======================================================================

1. Senior J2EE Developer
========================

Requirements:
- Solid Java programming experience
- Extensive full software development life cycle experience
- Strong knowledge of software architecture, OOA/OOD, UML, design patterns
- Strong J2EE (JSP/Servlet, JMS, EJB) experience
- Weblogic Server, JBoss Application Server experience
- Strong XML knowledge (XML DTD, XML-Schema)
- Platforms: Solaris, Linux, HP-UX
- Strong GUI development experience (Struts, HTML/DHTML, Javascript)
- Oracle (8i, 9i)/SQL experience
- Database Modeling
- Performance and Tuning experience
- CVS, Ant, Log4j, JUnit, XDoclet experience
- Ability to design, document, and implement ( hands-on coding required ) within tight deadlines
- Good leadership and mentoring skills
- Good communication skills
- Confident, Self-motivated/Team player

Wish list:
- Experience in the telecommunications field (SMS, WAP, SMSC, etc.) is an asset
- SOAP
- Java Server Faces
- Client-facing skills

2. Intermediate J2EE Developer
==============================
Requirements:
- Strong Java programming experience
- Knowledge of OOA/OOD
- J2EE (JSP/Servlet, JMS, EJB) experience
- Weblogic Server, JBoss Application Server experience
- XML knowledge (XML DTD, XML-Schema)
- Platforms: Solaris, Linux, HP-UX
- GUI development experience (Struts, HTML/DHTML, javascript)
- Oracle (8i, 9i)/SQL experience
- CVS, Ant, Log4j experience
- Good communication skills
- Self-motivated/Team player

Wish list:

- Experience in the telecommunications field (SMS, WAP, SMSC, etc.) is an asset
- SOAP
- Java Server Faces
post.title: J2EE Senior/Intermediate Developer Position
